![spark](data:image/png;base64,)

SciServer now has several datasets loaded into a local experimental spark cluster containing upwards of 400 cores and more than 750GB of memory. SciServer notebooks provide a simple way to run computations against the cluster. 

Astronomy datasets:
* ZTF DR3 lightcurves - over 1B objects in up to 3 color bands.
* Manga DR17 - various DAP and DRP products, including logcube and maps.
* Apogee FIRE simulation catalogs.

All these are experimental offerings that can be made available on a case-by-case basis. 

Ask us also about SciServer Spark@AWS!
